My fantastic lung #Doctor prescribed new #allergy medicine 4 me hoping 2 stop my debilitating #allergies but it's caused a #Crohns flare.
It's very frustrating b/c "miracle' #allergy drugs like #Claritin & #Allegra also cause painful #Crohns symptoms. #IBD
I now wonder if ANY #Allergy drug will help combat what r often completely debilitating allergy symptoms & severe lethargy. #Crohns #IBD
Many #Crohns #patients respond 2 these newer over-the-counter #allergy drugs w/ little or no side effects but they've never helped me.
I can't be at all productive when my #allergies affect me & there's so much I want 2 do.  4 me, #Crohns & allergies r somehow  related.
I just hope #Doctors learn a great deal from my strange case so other #Crohns #patients benefit.

My #allergy situation is compounded by a very serious lung condition likely caused by taking the drug #Humira 4 my #Crohns.
#Chemotherapy has helped w/ #inflammatory lung condition but my body can't tolerate more #chemo w/o radical effects on my body. #Crohns
Bottom line - connection b/n my seemingly innocuous #allergies & #Crohns is serious & it's a bummer that this new #allergy drug can't help.
